TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit AncestorDocOrderIterator extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Iterates over all ancestor nodes according to the ancestor axis rules, and returns the nodes in document order without duplicates.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Create (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator context, System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter, bool orSelf);
.method public hidebysig instance void Create(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator context, class System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter, bool orSelf) cil managed

Docs.param: The node from which you start traversing ancestors.
Enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
if you want the `context` node to be returned as a part of the iteration, instead of being filtered out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Positions the iterator on the next ancestor node in document order.
Docs.returns: if the iterator was set to the next ancestor node in document order; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the iterator was set to the next ancestor node in document order, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
